Title: An Ancient Evil
Description:
$n, I was looking for you!

One of the escaping sailors just spotted Aysa in the wreckage of the ship, facing some enormous beast. She might need your help - you should go to her, quickly!
ObjectivesText: Defeat the Vordraka, the Deep Sea Nightmare.
RewardText:
<Aysa is clearly exhausted from the fight.>

Your skills in battle... are unquestionable... $c.

<Aysa catches her breath for a moment.>

Did you save the escaped prisoners?  ...Where is Ji? Is he okay?

Objectives.Text: Vordraka, the Deep Sea Nightmare slain
